name: Gentleman Jack Sour
preparation:
A Whiskey Sour is only as good as the whiskey you start with. That’s why intensely smooth Gentleman Jack is the only way to begin the classic cocktail. From there, the rest is easy.

Add all the ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.

Strain into a chilled rocks glass over fresh ice.

Garnish with a half orange wheel and macerated cherry.
